summary: Cilium node based network policies may incorrectly allow workload traffic in github.com/cilium/cilium
details:
Cilium node based network policies may incorrectly allow workload traffic in github.com/cilium/cilium.

NOTE: The source advisory for this report contains additional versions that could not be automatically mapped to standard Go module versions.

(If this is causing false-positive reports from vulnerability scanners, please suggest an edit to the report.)

The additional affected modules and versions are: github.com/cilium/cilium from v1.17.0 before v1.17.2.
